messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] newbie questions/conference
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Ren and Marji.  If the room is available, I will use it.  I would still like to have a roommate to defray the cost, if anyone is interested. Crystal
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Ren and Marji. If the room is available, I will use it. I would
still like to have a roommate to defray the cost, if anyone is interested.

Crystal

messages.subject: newbie questions/conference
messages.msgSnippet: I still haven t found a roommate, so if you re interested, email me privately.  Rooms are around $80-100 for one night.  We need 2 nights with the cost split
messages.messageBody:
"I still haven't found a roommate, so if you're interested, email me
privately. Rooms are around $80-100 for one night. We need 2 nights with
the cost split in half.

Crystal"

I'm not absolutely sure yet, but it looks like the second room Marji booked will not be needed. I thought my sister was coming...then I thought a family here was coming, but it's not looking good. So there might be a room already reserved under Marji's name that is an extra (Do you still have that one Marji?)
I am supposed to call LeaAnn Monday to find out for sure, but if they aren't coming that would make a room available.

Ren
